title: Hydrocodone
summary: Hydrocodone is an opioid used to treat pain and as a cough suppressant.[9] It is taken by mouth.[9] Typically it is dispensed as the combinations acetaminophen/hydrocodone or ibuprofen/hydrocodone, for pain severe enough to require an opioid[10][11] and in combination with homatropine methylbromide to relieve cough.[9] It is also available by itself in a long acting form under the brand name Zohydro ER, among others, to treat severe pain of a prolonged duration.[9][12] Hydrocodone is a controlled drug, in the United States a Schedule II Controlled Substance.
